column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=What informs the question I asked about Hebrew is that it seems to build such a cohesive society here in Israel .
#Text=It ’s one of the binding forces ...
#Text=You said culture as justifying history , because I do n’t suggest to forget the language .
#Text=No. I am also for having individuality for nations .
#Text=That can be cultural .
#Text=But otherwise , I mean , let science run , let values stay permanent .
#Text=I ’ll give you just one example .
#Text=Take away the land , okay .
#Text=Take away a dunam of land .
#Text=But in our culture , the yield per dunam is 25 times higher than it used to be .
#Text=So maybe you lost one dunam but you won 25 yields .
#Text=On the other hand , take away the Ten Commandments and the world becomes all of a sudden poor .
#Text=You do n’t have anything to replace these 169 words .
#Text=So that ’s what I mean , the permanence of the values and the mobility of the assets .
#Text=One value used to be military service .
#Text=20 years ago it was anathema to not serve in the military and that was another binding cohesive force in Israeli society and now it ’s quite common ... .
#Text=Go over to sport , fight without killing , what ’s wrong ?
#Text=Go over to chess , go over to competition or a creativeness to sing , to create .
#Text=I would like to see the democracy not just a matter of real expression but a matter of self-expression .

#Text=Do you think Israel ’s security is at a point where it can move from being concerned with military service to being unconcerned and moving more towards competition in sports or the creative elements ?
#Text=The minute we shall be free of danger , yes .
#Text=Right now , no .
#Text=as long as we have dangers , we must be prepared to face them .
#Text=You cannot become all of a sudden a philosopher instead of a soldier .
#Text=It does n’t make sense .
#Text=But you see there are two things which are really fascinating .
#Text=What makes Israel greater than our size ?
#Text=And that is the size of our enemies .
#Text=We are forced to organize our defense , which means our agenda , not with the size of the land but with the size of the enemies of the land .
#Text=So all the time we have to be more tense , more alert , more developed .
#Text=The minute this will disappear , we will have to compete with the world to find our way .
#Text=I think there is something in Judaism , by the way , which makes us inclined to do so .
#Text=The greatest thing about Judaism -- you can take it as a joke , you can take it seriously -- is that introduced to life is dissatisfaction .
#Text=A Jewish person cannot be satisfied , cannot be satisfied .
#Text=The minute he is satisfied he begins to be non-Jewish .
#Text=Dissatisfaction is the source of creation .
#Text=All the time , because we were oppressed , we were small , we could n’t sit down and have a glass of wine .
#Text=All through time we have had to try and struggle and invest and renew .
#Text=That is the reason why the Jewish people , in a way , are the permanent revolutionaries of history .
